zade.name: Zade
zade.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 1.

accorte.name: Accorte
accorte.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 1. Leaves after Chapter 20.

ashram.name: Ashram

Haldyn.note: After Ashram x Haldyn Talk in Ch.11
After Ashram x Haldyn Talk in Ch.11

ashram.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 1.

sujata.name: Sujata
sujata.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 1.

sheela.name: Sheela

Penneloupe.note: After Sheela x Zayid Talk in Ch. 11
After Sheela x Zayid Talk in Ch. 11

sheela.recruit: Joins at the start of Player Phase a turn following any player unit approaching the Fasthold occupied by Aristotle's men in Chapter 1.

zayid.name: Zayid

Penneloupe.note: After Sheela x Penneloupe Talk in Ch. 11
After Sheela x Penneloupe Talk in Ch. 11

zayid.recruit: Joins at the start of Player Phase a turn following any player unit approaching the Fasthold occupied by Aristotle's men in Chapter 1.

slayne.name: Slayne
slayne.recruit: Joins on Turn 2 Player Phase of Chapter 2. Leaves after Chapter 20 if Accorte is alive by then.

hilda.name: Hilda
hilda.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 3, if her cell was opened in Chapter 2. Leaves after Chapter 6.

baymonk.name: Baymonk
baymonk.recruit: Recruited by talking to him with Zade and paying 2,000D in Chapter 3.

drake.name: Drake
drake.recruit: Recruited by talking to him with Zade holding the Crested Armlet☆ in Chapter 3.

castore.name: Castore
castore.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 4, if captured by Zade in Chapter 3.

porruck.name: Porruck
porruck.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 4, if captured by Zade in Chapter 3.

karajan.name: Karajan
karajan.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 4, if captured by Zade in Chapter 3.

jonathan.name: Jonathan
jonathan.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 4.

nelke.name: Nelke
nelke.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 4, if Zade talked to Baymonk.

bennette.name: Bennette
bennette.recruit: Joins on Turn 2 Player Phase of Chapter 4. Even upon being felled in battle, returns after Chapter 15. If she is allowed to leave after Chapter 18, returns upon commencing battle in Chapter 25.

lucion.name: Lucion
lucion.recruit: Joins on Turn 3 Player Phase of Chapter 4.

phoeve.name: Phoeve
phoeve.recruit: Joins on Turn 4 Player Phase of Chapter 4. If Fauve is alive by Chapter 16, Bennette needs to visit the upper middle house by Turn 20 in order for her to stay.

abrahm.name: Abrahm
abrahm.recruit: Joins on Turn 4 Player Phase of Chapter 4.

claude.name: Claude
claude.recruit: Joins on Turn 6 Player Phase of Chapter 4.

alexander.name: Alexander
alexander.recruit: Appears at the start of Turn 11 Enemy Phase in Chapter 4. Recruited by talking to either him or Hestion with Zade with neither dead.

hestion.name: Hestion
hestion.recruit: Appears at the start of Turn 11 Enemy Phase in Chapter 4. Recruited by talking to either him or Alexander with Zade with neither dead.

laffine.name: Laffine
laffine.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 5.

amlute.name: Amlute

Salyna.note: After Amlute x Salyna Talk in Ch.18

amlute.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 5.

barzelphen.name: Barzelphen
barzelphen.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 6, if captured by Zade in Chapter 5.

bertoullia.name: Bertoullia
bertoullia.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 6, if in Chapter 5 the green house was visited, 600D was paid and she survives the map.

roleck.name: Roleck
roleck.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 6. Leaves after Chapter 14. If Bennette is allowed to leave after Chapter 18, returns upon commencing battle in Chapter 25.

aslanne.name: Aslanne
aslanne.recruit: Joins at the start of Player Phase a turn following any player unit approaching Libbech Fortress in Chapter 6.

ezrel.name: Ezrel
ezrel.recruit: Joins at the start of Player Phase a turn following any player unit approaching Libbech Fortress in Chapter 6.

ouron.name: Ouron
ouron.recruit: Available from the start of the chapter in Chapter 7x.

penneloupe.name: Penneloupe

Sheela.note: After Sheela x Zayid talk in Ch. 11

Zayid.note: After Sheela x Penneloupe talk in Ch. 11

Sheela.note: After Sheela x Zayid talk in Ch. 11

Zayid.note: After Sheela x Penneloupe talk in Ch. 11

penneloupe.recruit: Recruited by visiting the village in Chapter 7x.

haldyn.name: Haldyn

Ashram.note: After Ashram x Haldyn Talk in Ch. 11
After Ashram x Haldyn Talk in Ch. 11

haldyn.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 8.

orphelia.name: Orphelia
orphelia.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 8.

fauve.name: Fauve
fauve.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 8.

lilia.name: Lilia
lilia.recruit: Available from the start of Chapter 8.

pandell.name: Pandell
pandell.recruit: [Temporary Replacement Unit] Available from the start of Chapter 8, only if is Lucion dead. Leaves after Chapter 8.

montgomery.name: Montgomery
montgomery.recruit: [Temporary Replacement Unit] Available from the start of Chapter 8, only if is Abrahm dead. Leaves after Chapter 8.

cueger.name: Cueger
cueger.recruit: [Temporary Replacement Unit] Available from the start of Chapter 8, only if is Claude dead. Leaves after Chapter 8.

sloan.name: Sloan
sloan.recruit: [Replacement Unit] Joins upon commencing battle in Chapter 10, only if is Haldyn dead. Playable from the start of Chapter 11.

arielle.name: Arielle
arielle.recruit: [First Guest Appearance] Available as a guest unit from Turn 11 Player Phase of Chapter 15. Leaves after Chapter 15.[Second Guest Appearance] Returns as a guest unit upon commencing battle in Chapter 19. Leaves after Chapter 19.

salyna.name: Salyna

Amlute.note: After Amlute x Salyna Talk in Ch. 18

salyna.recruit: [Initial Appearance] Available upon commencing battle in Chapter 18.[Permanent Join] Have Zade talk to her in Chapter 18.

mia.name: Mia
mia.recruit: Available upon commencing battle in Chapter 20, if both Alexander and Hestion are alive.

phoros.name: Phoros
phoros.recruit: Joins on Turn 11 Player Phase of Chapter 20, if talked to with Arielle in Chapter 19.

ravinia.name: Ravinia
ravinia.recruit: Available from the preparations menu for Chapter 21, if captured by Haldyn in Chapter 20.

cezar.name: Cezar
cezar.recruit: [Replacement Unit] Available as a guest unit upon commencing battle in Chapter 21, only if Drake is dead. Leaves after Chapter 21.

theodel.name: Theodel
theodel.recruit: [Guest Appearance] Available as a guest unit upon commencing battle in Chapter 21. Leaves after Chapter 21.[Permanent Join] Returns on Turn 10 Player Phase of Chapter 25.

emilia.name: Emilia
emilia.recruit: [First Guest Appearance] Automatically from the start of Chapter 21 as a guest unit. Leaves after Chapter 21.[Second Guest Appearance] Returns as a guest unit on Turn 10 Player Phase of Chapter 25.

garlan.name: Garlan
garlan.recruit: Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24.

tasha.name: Tasha
tasha.recruit: [Guest Appearance] Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24.[Permanent Join] Returns on Turn 10 Player Phase of Chapter 25.

bonacel.name: Bonacel
bonacel.recruit: Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24.

prody.name: Prody
prody.recruit: Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24.

rebel.name: Rebel
rebel.recruit: Joins as a guest unit in Chapter 23 when his cell is opened. Leaves after Chapter 23.

grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.recruit: Joins as a guest unit in Chapter 23 when her cell is opened. Leaves after Chapter 23.

minister.name: Minister
minister.recruit: Joins as a guest unit in Chapter 23 when his cell is opened. Leaves after Chapter 23.

emma.name: Emma
emma.recruit: Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24.

troy.name: Troy
troy.recruit: [Guest Appearance] Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24. [Permanent Join] Returns on Turn 10 Player Phase of Chapter 25.

lea.name: Lea
lea.recruit: [Guest Appearance] Available as a guest unit from the start of Chapter 23. Leaves after Chapter 24. [Permanent Join] Returns on Turn 10 Player Phase of Chapter 25.

paulos.name: Paulos
paulos.recruit: Available from the preparation menu for Chapter 25.

athol.name: Athol
athol.recruit: Recruited by having Zade reach 1 tile right 1 tile below Adonsphair's Head in Chapter 25.
